tswitem.name: Signet of Insurance
tswitem.tooltip:
Signet of Insurance
Signet (QL 10)
Tradeable
Effect: Whenever you hit or heal, you gain a beneficial effect which lasts 10 seconds. This effect can only be gained once every 15 seconds. If this effect is purged, you gain a beneficial effect which increases your Evade Chance and the chance for attacks to glance you by 10%/20%/30% for 10 seconds. This effect cannot be purged. This Signet can be attached to Head Talismans or Weapons.
